* The Ui class encapsulates all the methods for user input and printing to the terminal.
* Wraps a given message above and below with lines and prints it.

* The AddCommand encapsulates a Command that adds Tasks to a TaskList.
* @param type the type of the Task to add.
* @param args the arguments to create the Task.
* Will add the Task corresponding to this AddCommand to the given TaskList.
* Will also store the updated TaskList to taskList.txt.
* @throws DukeException when a Task cannot be created.
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException {

* The ClearCommand is the Command given to clear the TaskList of its tasks.
* Clears the given TaskList of its tasks.
* Will also save the empty TaskList to taskList.txt.

* The Command class encapsulates a command to be executed by Duke.
* Each Command has a unique command word associated with it.
* Executes the Command based on a given TaskList, Ui and Storage.
* @throws DukeException when the Command cannot be executed.
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws DukeException;

* The Deadline class encapsulates a Task to be done by a given deadline.

* Enumerates the possible types of Tasks.
